particle.description: If specified, the specified particle will be forced to render for the player.
particle.markdownDescription: If specified, the specified particle will be forced to render for the player.

particles.description: If specified, the specified particles will be forced to render for the player.
particles.markdownDescription: If specified, the specified particles will be forced to render for the player.

type.description:
[Power Type](../power_types.md)

Forces one or multiple particles to render for the player, regardless of their "Particle Settings".

Type ID: `apugli:force_particle_render`
type.markdownDescription:
[Power Type](../power_types.md)

Forces one or multiple particles to render for the player, regardless of their "Particle Settings".

Type ID: `apugli:force_particle_render`
